com.univaq.platformsfinder.tools

Class BundleFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.univaq.platformsfinder.tools.BundleFactory

  • public class BundleFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates Bundles for all the classes

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BundleFactory() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      android.os.Bundle addressBundle(com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng location, int distance)
      Returns bundle passed from MainActivity to MapActivity MapActivity starts in Address Mode Contains distance and location infos
      android.os.Bundle detailsBundle(com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Marker marker, android.content.Context context)
      Returns bundle passed from MapActivity to DetailsActivity Gets marker as param, extracts marker's platform and incapsulates platform id in bundle
      android.os.Bundle listBundle(android.location.Location location, int distance)
      Returns bundle passed from MapActivity to ListActivity Contains distance and current location coordinates
      android.os.Bundle listDetailsBundle(PlatformTable table)
      Returns bundle passed from ListAdapter to DetailsActivity Contains platform id
      android.os.Bundle mainBundle(int distance)
      Returns bundle passed from MainActivity to MapActivity MapActivity starts in Location Mode
